data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Saint Mary, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Mary, Jersey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 108 believers in Saint Mary against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 16 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Saint Mary, Jersey.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Saint Mary.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Saint Mary, Jersey by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Saint Mary
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: God, guide the 108 believers in Saint Mary to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
